home.title: Home
home.popularCoins: Those are the most popular and well-known cryptocurrencies and you are in the place where you can buy, sell, swap, hold or send these (and not only) cryptocurrencies
home.digitalArt: We bet you definitely have heard about this modern form of digital art? You ask if you have got a couple? You God damn right! And we can guess that you'd like to get a couple of yours, wouldn't you?
home.gotThis: Oh! You have got this also?
home.onlyEmail: The only thing we need, is your email address

about.title: About
about.realWeb3: Place, where we want to make WEB3 real
about.cryptoDistrictIntro: is the place where we truly believe in WEB3 ideas and try to make it easier and more available to everyone to touch future of digital currencies and the Internet.
about.marketPlace: This marketplace is just another tool that wants to give users new experience of cryptomarketplace usage.
about.futureOfMoney: Future of money, money of future
about.centrlization: Centralization has helped onboard billions of people to the World Wide Web and created the stable, robust infrastructure on which it lives.
about.centrlization2: At the same time, a handful of centralized entities have a stronghold on large swathes of the World Wide Web, unilaterally deciding what should and should not be allowed.
about.centrlization3: Web3 is the answer to this dilemma. Instead of a Web monopolized by large technology companies, Web3 embraces decentralization and is being built, operated, and owned by its users. Web3 puts power in the hands of individuals rather than corporations.
about.blockchain: If the past tells us anything, it is that once blockchains become a necessary part of everyday life, we will stop talking about them. That’s what happens to the essential technical underpinnings of killer apps.
about.blockchain2: When the revolution comes, it will be because blockchain technology is a mature, stable foundation for the apps and services we want. We’ll focus on those, and we’ll stop talking so much about blockchain. We will know that blockchain technology has achieved its success when we stop talking about it.

signin.title: Sign In
signin.text2: We are glad to see again!
signin.text3: We are quite sure you have been doing this hundreds times before, so, no need to explain what you need to do, fields on the left side.

signup.title: Sign Up
signup.welcome: Welcome to Cryptodistrict - platform that will keep you in touch with everything that happens in the world of cryptocurrencies.
signup.welcomeText: We are quite sure you have been doing this hundreds times before, so, no need to explain what you need to do, fields on the right side. See ya!
signup.iHaveRead: I confirm that I have read and accepted
signup.passwordLength: Password length should be more than 8 characters
signup.passwordUpper: Password should contain at least one uppercase character
signup.passwordLower: Password should contain at least one lowercase character
signup.passwordSpecial: Password should contain at least one special character
signup.passwordDigit: Password should contain at least one digit character
signup.tellAbout: Tell us a little about yourself
signup.skip: Don't worry, you can skip this step and fill information you want later
signup.tellTheWorld: What do you want to tell this world?
signup.publicEmail: Show my email as public email for contact
signup.successCreation: Your account has been successfully created!
signup.checkEmail: Please, check you email inbox in order to confirm registration by clicking the link you will find inside the message.

contact.title: Contact
contact.pageTitle: Wanna talk? Sure, glad to hear you!
contact.content: We'd be glad to hear any feedback, propositions, found bugs or news about your day.
contact.emailRequest: What do you want to tell us?

error.title: Not found
error.pageTitle: It's quite empty here, isn't it?
error.content: Not sure what you were trying to found, but it's defensively not here
error.link: Try to find it somewhere else

comingSoon.title: Coming soon
comingSoon.pageTitle: Oh... Don't be so impatient, cool things are coming soon
comingSoon.content: We are creating cool stuff here, so, just wait for a moment and you will get what you want

confirmacc.title: Account confirmation
confirmacc.lastStep: Verification of your email is the last things separates you and the wonderful world of WEB3!
confirmacc.inProgress: Please, be patient, we are some magic stuff behind the scene while verifying your account.
confirmacc.success: Success! Welcome here, newbie! It's nice to see you, hang around here and try to find some fun.
confirmacc.error: Um... You know, something went wrong there... Well... Wanna contact us?!
